meanings.definition: Having a taste or smell similar to salt.
meanings.sent1: The soup was so saltlike that it reminded me of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The air by the sea always carries a saltlike scent.
meanings.sent3: The saltlike aroma of the popcorn filled the entire room, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her tears tasted strangely saltlike, as if she had been crying in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The saltlike smell of the sea breeze brought back memories of childhood vacations.
